abstract.textEnglish: An active form of parasporin-2, a B. thuringiensis crystal protein toxic to particular human cells, has been crystallized. Native data have been collected to 2.75 Å resolution.

title.textEnglish: Crystallization of parasporin-2, a Bacillus thuringiensis crystal protein with selective cytocidal activity against human cells
